description: This file defines a subclass of OETestContext called CheckLayerTestContext, which adds additional attributes related to testing layers in the openembedded-core build system. It imports standard modules and one external class for extension.

classes.name: CheckLayerTestContext
classes.description: A subclass of OETestContext that adds attributes specific to checking layer signatures and identifying the layer under test.

methods.name: __init__(self, td=None, logger=None, layer=None, test_software_layer_signatures=True)
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the CheckLayerTestContext, calling the superclass constructor and setting layer-specific attributes.
